attributes.action: hold an open public consultation regarding the Ebbsfleet Landmark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition urges the Ebbsfleet Landmark Development team to reject all five of the shortlisted designs as being inappropriate for the local area.  The people of Gravesham need a chance to liase on a formal basis with the developement team as there is a huge lack of local influence in the final designs.
